EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-01-15-CWOM Days Kansas City 3 Day Reminder.CWOM Days
EmailTemplate.subject: Cisco Workload Optimization Day Kansas City – 3 Day Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is a reminder that you have registered to attend Cisco Workload Optimization Manager (WOM) Day Kansas City on January 18 at 7400 College Blvd, Overland Park, KS.
Cisco WOM Day Kansas City is a 3-hour planning session with your regional Cisco field reps, Cisco partners and Turbonomic account executives to discuss how to leverage the Cisco WOM solution to more quickly retire sales quotas. Attend this event to:
- Learn more about the Cisco and Turbonomic Partnership
- Get an in-depth overview of Cisco Workload Optimization Manager
- Understand how Cisco WOM compliments and augments Tetration and AppDynamics
- Participate in discussions with your sales peers on how to engage and position Cisco WOM with customers
Agenda: 2:30 Welcome & Introductions 2:45 Who is Turbonomic? Overview of Turbonomic and Cisco Partnership 3:15 Cisco Workload Optimization Manager & Product Demo 3:45 AppDynamics Presentation 4:05 Working Better Together 4:15 Break 4:30 Panel Discussion 5:00 Wrap-Wp 5:30 Cocktail Reception: Fox & Hound Location: Cisco WOM Days Meetings - 7400 College Blvd, Overland Park, KS 66210 <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/7400+College+Blvd,+Overland+Park,+KS+66210/@38.928674,-94.672091,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x87c0ea4eddde08bf:0x1b50c9d18e8c102b!8m2!3d38.9286737!4d-94.6720914?hl=en-US]]> Cocktail Reception - 10428 Metcalf Ave, Overland Park, KS 66212 <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Fox+%26+Hound/@38.9395,-94.6715547,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x87c0ebb5b0050b9f:0x2deaebc6ee144dda!8m2!3d38.9395!4d-94.669366?hl=en-US]]>
I look forward to seeing you at this event!
Regards, Tami Pearlstein
